label: Ingredient Search
description: Search ingredients suitable for your applications

defaultOutputs.name: ID
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Unique identifier for each ingredient search result.

defaultOutputs.name: Ingredient Name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Common or trade name of the ingredient (e.g. "Glycerin", "Hyaluronic Acid", "Bakuchiol").

defaultOutputs.name: INCI Name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: International Nomenclature of Cosmetic Ingredients (INCI) name, the standardized name used in cosmetic labeling.

defaultOutputs.name: CAS Number
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS) registry number, a unique identifier for the chemical substance (e.g. "56-81-5", "9004-61-9"). May be "N/A" for complex mixtures.

defaultOutputs.name: Supplier Count
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Number of available suppliers for this ingredient in the database.

defaultOutputs.name: Sources
defaultOutputs.tooltip: URL link to the supplier list document (PDF) containing detailed supplier information for the ingredient. May be empty if no supplier list is available.

configSchema.label: Search Ingredient
configSchema.placeholder: Search by ingredient function, application, or INCI name
configSchema.tooltip:
Enter search terms to find ingredients. You can search by:
- **Function**: e.g., "moisturizing", "anti-aging"
- **Application**: e.g., "hair care", "scalp care"
- **INCI name**: e.g., "Niacinamide", "Biotin"

configSchema.label: Upload Ingredient List
configSchema.tooltip: Upload a document or image containing ingredient information. Supports multiple formats including **PDF**, **Word**, **CSV**, and **images** (OCR will be applied).
